commands.description: Provide feedback on Your Teladoc Teams App experience

longDescription:
At Teladoc Health, we want to make managing your chronic condition even easier. That’s why we’ve integrated our condition management programs in to Microsoft Teams. Now you can manage your health during your workday to experience a healthier you.

**Stay on top of your work. Take charge of your health. All in one place and at no cost to you.**

 In order to use this app, you must have an active Teladoc Health Condition Management account. Access to Teladoc Health Condition Management is dependent upon your employer's benefits package. Please contact your HR or benefits team to confirm whether you are eligible for a Teladoc Health Condition Management account.

 Teladoc Health Condition Management, formerly Livongo, offers a holistic and connected experience through devices, real-time data, reminders, expert coaching and other tools and support. Our programs provide the tips and tools you need to achieve your goals and build healthy habits that will last a lifetime. And now, we make it even easier to manage the day-to-day of your condition through Microsoft Teams.

 **See all your health data, all in one place**

 Our connected devices upload readings to your account seamlessly, making it easy to share reports with your doctor.

**Get real-time feedback and guidance**

We combine your data with our technology to power personalized insights and real-time tips. You get a more detailed picture of your overall health, so you can adapt your routine.

**Connect with an expert coach**

Learn about how to connect with a real person by phone or online messaging. They can help you with goal-setting, healthy eating, activity, stress, medications and more. Coaching is flexible, too. No prescribed diets. No hard-set rules. You set the pace. And it’s at no cost to you.

**Track your food**

Add your meals right to see a breakdown of your macronutrients, build awareness, spot patterns and stay accountable to your goals.

**Get a little nudge at the right time**

We’ll guide you to a healthier lifestyle with well-timed reminders to weigh in, check your blood sugar, take your blood pressure and even track a meal.

**Tap in to the Teladoc Health Condition Management Bot**

The Teladoc Health Condition Management bot can help you enroll, take accurate readings and set and manage reminders.

**Understand your patterns and trends**

Our simple, easy-to-understand charts and summaries provide you with all the information you need to make the right choices to improve your health.

**Rest assured that your privacy is important to us**

Your data uploads securely to your account. You can choose to share your data with your doctors, but we will not disclose your data without your consent. Learn more on the privacy tab.

**Order test strips with one tap**

Say goodbye to unnecessary hiccups in your checking routine. We provide UNLIMITED strips and lancets sent to your door and at no cost to you.

**Questions?**

We're here to help! Learn how to contact the Teladoc Health member support team [here](https://library.teladochealth.com/hc/en-us/articles/360016317474-Global-Member-Support-Contact-Numbers).
shortDescription: Virtual health management program and support | Teladoc
